text: Making the Doughnut Batter Preheat the oven to 350°F/180°C.  Mix the wet ingredients. In a large bowl, beat the sugar, egg, milk, and butter with a stand or hand mixer. Mix the dry ingredients. Use a medium bowl to combine the flour, baking powder, and salt with a fork. Incorporate the two bowls. Sift the dry ingredients into the wet ingredient bowl. For the best results and easier stirring, sift a small amount at a time in between stirring. Add the vanilla and cereal in last. Combine everything just until mixed, never over mix it. Baking the Doughnuts Fill a doughnut pan. Add the batter to the cavities of the pan, about 3/4 full. Bake the doughnuts for 10 minutes.  Allow the doughnuts to cool. Leave them in the pan for a few minutes. Transfer the doughnuts to a wire cooling rack. Set aside for about 15 to 20 minutes. Icing the Doughnut Combine the frosting ingredients together. In a small bowl, use a spoon to thoroughly whip everything until you achieve a smooth mixture. Dip the doughnuts into the frosting.  Garnish the doughnuts. Before the frosting sets, sprinkle the cup of cereal on top of it. Enjoy it as a snack or for breakfast.
